titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Card 1: july 7: "The wind in " Card 1: july 13: "Revolution ed."

body.ab:
1939 BUTLER. H.M. Hotel de l'Univers. rue Monsieur la Prince _ 1 m. 1 v. B. 50 dep ref. 50
july 5 Apes of God. july 6 6 New Writing 2. spring 1939. july 7 7 The wind in july 10 7 Escape to life ____ 10 10 Naomi Mitchinson's Vienna Diary July 13 10 Looking forward July 13 13 Starting Point july 17 13 Revolution july 18 17 Writer in a changing world july 18 18 Intelligentsia of Great Britain, Minsky 18 A new american history, Woodward wrote to July 28
26 Willow Road Hampstead N.W. 3 London
Mr Vulliamy 43 ave de l'Observatoire - V called Aug 31 with deposit receipt. Knew nothing about the books. Deposit was not refunded to him. Advised S B write to Butler
1939 S B enquired again at hotel de l'Univers Sept 10 but not a trace of books
Oct 4 Proprietress of hotel de l'Univers came to say books not discovered anywhere
Nov 11 S B wrote again
Nov. 27. 1939. received copy "A New American History". by W.E. Woodward - which Mr. Butler send - S.B. will refund dep. of 50v through F.B. - I will advise Butler of same.
Dep. ref. Nov. 27 1939 via F.B.
